Marketplace

money protection

data protection

fast and secure

Create and sell your nfts?

Set up your wallet

Once you've set up your wallet of choice,connect it to OpenSea by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner. Learn about the wallets we support.

Create Your collection

Click My Collection and set up your Collection. Add social links, a description, profile & banner images, and set a secondary sales fee.

Add Your NFTs

Upload your work (images video, audio, or 3D art),and a title and description,and customize your NFTs with properties, slats, and unlockable content.

List then For Sale

Choose between actions, fixed-price listings,and declining-price listings, You choose how you want to sell your nfts, and we help you sell them!
